text:
Graham David Fellows (born 22 June 1956 in Manchester, England) is an English comedy actor, musician and voice actor.
His character vocal work includes UK voices of Brad Carbunkle and Tuck Carbunkle in "My Life as a Teenage Robot", UK voices of Brick and Boomer in "The Powerpuff Girls", UK voices of Cosmo, Mr Turner and Mark Chang in "The Fairly OddParents" and UK voices of Dexter and Dexter’s Dad in "Dexter's Laboratory".

annotations.surface_form: My Life as a Teenage Robot
